summary:
Clean Vanilla save with no mods.
This save is for a level 1 Nord Male located in Dragonsreach in Whiterun.
Character can be altered by opening up the console using the '~' key and typing in 'showracemenu' without the quotations.
descriptionHtml:
Saved game files can be placed into your Skyrim Saved Games folder.
Typically by default this folder can be found at C:\Users\User\Documents\My games\Skyrim\Saves.

Features:

- Several early quests completed including escaping from Helgen, killing your first dragon and discovering you're dragonborn, becoming thane of Whiterun, and visiting the greybeards. You also own the fully furnished version of Breezehome in Whiterun.

- Level 1 with no distributed stat points or perks. 
- Will hit level 37 once you distribute all stat points.
- Has max level 100 in smithing, alchemy, enchanting, and speech.
- Has all perk points for the aforementioned skills which were obtained using console commands. (Optional files available without perks)
- Has discovered all Enchantments.
- Has discovered all alchemical effects from all ingredients.
- 2 sets of pre-enchanted gear, one for boosting created potions by approx. 245%, and one for boosting smithing improvements by approx. 245%. 
These sets can be found in the character's inventory and only need to be used if desired. If you find using the full set is too OP then perhaps only using 1 or 2 pieces will better suit your needs. A pair of Notched Pickaxes are also included on the character to further boost smithing improvements.
- Optional files available with all dragon shouts unlocked.

I created this character as the perfect starting ground for me to reroll characters for different playthroughs. 
This save is great for allowing you to begin a game and create all your desired armor with desired enchants.
Having maxed alchemy and all effects discovered is perfect for creating any potion or poison you could want.
Having maxed Speech not only allows for better prices, but will also open up more dialogue options for you during your playthroughs.

And because this save is fully Vanilla and clean of any mod it is also the perfect clean slate for mod testing. 

There is a bit of a mess in Farengar's room in Dragonsreach as well as Farengar's inventory. Sorry about that. 

Thank you and enjoy.

**IMPORTANT**
For those of you who don't know here is a video on how to change your race and appearance in game without resetting your skills.
Open console using '~' key. Type "player.setrace" without quotations and followed by your chosen race e.g. orc. Next type in "showracemenu" without quotations in order to alter your appearance. Do not change your race within the race menu otherwise your skills will reset.
[youtube]GpOVp0H59nQ[/youtube]

There are four available saved files to download:

1. Maxed Smithing, Alchemy, Enchanting, and Speech with ALL respective perks and NO dragon shouts unlocked.
2. Maxed Smithing, Alchemy, Enchanting, and Speech with ALL respective perks and ALL dragon shouts unlocked.
3. Maxed Smithing, Alchemy, Enchanting, and Speech with NO perks and NO dragon shouts unlocked.
4. Maxed Smithing, Alchemy, Enchanting, and Speech with NO perks and ALL dragon shouts unlocked.

I appreciate any feedback regarding issues or uses you may find.
author: Zeromortelle
